ModMetaData.name: Autotester Forked
ModMetaData.author: Geel
ModMetaData.description:
It is a fork of original mod [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3497629017]Autotester[/url]
[h3]Changes[/h3] [list] [*]Removed game close on warning or error (you could see the error in game logs) [*]Added options for: generating translation report, spawn mod items, open mod options, change map size(minimum size is 100) [*]It spawns content of all active mods one by one [/list]
Settings file is located in the mod config-folder, filename ending with "Autotester.xml". [url=https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=50995.0]https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=50995.0[/url]
